criteria: All core AWS resources (VPC, RDS, Cognito, ECS) provisioned via Terraform. Frontend can successfully authenticate against the provisioned Cognito User Pool.
success_metrics: End-to-end login E2E test passes in the deployed dev environment.

criteria: All API endpoints for user data (history) are protected and enforce user-scoping. No IDOR vulnerabilities present.
success_metrics: All negative test cases (User A trying to access User B's data) pass with 403/404 responses.

criteria: The `isolated-vm` sandbox correctly prevents execution of disallowed functions and system calls. Lambda has minimum necessary IAM permissions.
tools_used: Custom test scripts with malicious payloads, AWS IAM Policy Simulator.
success_metrics: No sandbox escape is possible. No privilege escalation is possible.
